com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide
Class DownloadDataActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.CommonActivity
                      com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.DownloadDataActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class DownloadDataActivity
extends CommonActivity

Class for handling and displaying the progress of the download of data from the application. This class is used to show the user progress information whilst the database data is being downloaded. This class also enables error handling when data download fails, allow the user to cancel or retry.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Aidan Wynne Fewster

          Drug information request listener Methods within this class are called when a drugs list download completes or fails.
private  class DownloadDataActivity.indexDownloadRequestListener

onStart

protected void onStart()
Called when the activity resumes (E.g. when the user comes back into the application) This method resumes all request listeners and updates progress, so that the progress displays progress made whilst in the background.
